local helper = battle_helper

---@type battle_skill_handler
local battle_skill_handler = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'battle_skill_handler')
---@type battle_skill_running
local battle_skill_running = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'battle_skill_running')
---@type battle_skill_behavior
local battle_skill_behavior = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'battle_skill_behavior')
---@type battle_buff_behavior
local battle_buff_behavior = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'battle_buff_behavior')
---@type battle_visual_follow
local battle_visual_follow = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'battle_visual_follow')
---@type battle_final_attack
local battle_final_attack = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'battle_final_attack')
---@type battle_skill_camera
local battle_skill_camera = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'battle_skill_camera')
---@type battle_skill_trigger
local battle_skill_trigger = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'battle_skill_trigger')

---@type systems
local super = require(helper.path.ecs .. 'systems')
---@class system_battle_skill : systems
local system_battle_skill = class("system_battle_skill", super)

---构造函数
---@protected
---@param context context
function system_battle_skill:ctor(context)
    super.ctor(self, context)
end

---添加系统
---@protected
---@param context context
function system_battle_skill:add_system(context)
    self:add(battle_skill_handler.new(context))
    self:add(battle_skill_running.new(context))
    self:add(battle_skill_behavior.new(context))
    self:add(battle_buff_behavior.new(context))
    self:add(battle_visual_follow.new(context))
    self:add(battle_final_attack.new(context))
    self:add(battle_skill_camera.new(context))
    self:add(battle_skill_trigger.new(context))
end

return system_battle_skill
